item.description:
hello all,

Anyone interested in joining us for the future Meetup events planning? Your ideas/thoughts/suggestions etc. are important to keep the meetup continue.....everyone is welcome...

Date: 12/1/07
Time: 12 noon
Place: Super 88 Food Court
1095 Commonwealth Ave.
Allston, Boston
617-787-2288

After our meeting, we will heading to bowling at Lanes & Games

Time: 4PM
address:
195 Concord Turnpike, Rte 2E
Cambridge, MA 02140
(617) 876-5533

$2.75 for shoe rental, $4.75(ten pin) per game, per person.

for directions, please go to http://www.lanesgames...

Please make a note on your RSVP...for meeting or bowling or both. Will send out contact information to those RSVPed.

Please email me if you have any questions

Susan

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: discussion of future meetup events & Bowling
